title: FINAL Black Widow Trailer Kinda Funny Live Reactions
description:
The boys react to the new FINAL Marvel Studios Black Widow trailer.

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com

transcript_chunks.text: [Music] what's up and welcome to kind of funny's reaction to the final black widow trailer we've reacted to multiple trailers for this movie here on youtube kind of funny exactly it does feel like that but i'm feeling really good about this guys i think this is it this is actually the final trailer we're actually gonna get this movie in a couple months just a couple sweet sweet months on disney plus and in theaters as always i'm tim gettys joined by andy cortez this is one of the last things we did before quarantine one of the last i think the last trailer reaction we did before insane because yeah i've ever seen the thumbnail of kevin for like years or i guess the whole year of course kevin kevin in the trailer oh well i don't remember much then yeah kev how excited for this are you i'm really stoked i can't believe that we're gonna get another mcu movie and like it's not like two years away you know what i mean like this is exciting stuff we might get a bunch if everything goes

i'm really stoked i can't believe that we're gonna get another mcu movie and like it's not like two years away you know what i mean like this is exciting stuff we might get a bunch if everything goes smoothly and nick's garpino oh man i mean it feels like it feels like we all were just in prison for a year and now this is like but they're like oh we screwed up we're sorry you guys here's your reward you get a bunch of dope marvel shows and marvel movies and they're gonna come out very fast and close to each other kicking it off with uh black widow very excited for this tim so let's check it out you don't know everything about me i've lived a lot of lives before i was an avenger before i got this family choosing between what the world wants you to be oh don't do that to me i knew you were they got me [Music] oh man where did you think i was all this time we have unfinished business my girls are the toughest girls in the world i'm sorry we had our orders and we played our rule it wasn't

got me [Music] oh man where did you think i was all this time we have unfinished business my girls are the toughest girls in the world i'm sorry we had our orders and we played our rule it wasn't real it was real to me to me you were [Music] oh [Music] man that car really blew her up there real high that was a really cool cut for a trailer in russian in [ __ ] russian give it to me god premiere access that's crazy is cool inject that into my body dude let let me start off with this let me start off with this i legitimately thought there was no way this trailer was going to end and i was going to say anything other than we didn't need to see that wow oh no [ __ ] that this was awesome this was such a great use of old footage the avengers hype music tying it all into the rest of the mcu stuff as well as so many scenes we've already seen in the 10 trailers for this so far but enough new stuff to make me be like oh man i am i'm legitimately [ __ ] hyped for this love the russian version

as well as so many scenes we've already seen in the 10 trailers for this so far but enough new stuff to make me be like oh man i am i'm legitimately [ __ ] hyped for this love the russian version of the thief at the end that was incredible nick what do you think i mean i love it it's it's it's almost starting to feel like a little bit of a swan song for the character itself right like we're seeing we've already seen her get like sacrificed her life for the great good and now we're seeing like all the motivations good and bad that led her to that decision and to me that's like that's where it really starts tugging on the heart strings where i'm like you know you didn't want this character to die and now you're seeing kind of what she had to go through to get to that point it's super cool but i mean this is also just a phenomenal trailer like i was with youtube i was like i don't need to see any more trailers for this i already sold in this movie this one i think they were i don't know
